pullRequest.title: Render Ground Items tile overlay at correct height
pullRequest.bodyText: Added zOffset argument for Perspective.getCanvasTilePoly and Perspective.getCanvasTileAreaPoly to allow Ground Items to render the tile overlay at the correct height (for example tables).

commit.message: Overload Perspective.getCanvasTilePoly and Perspective.getCanvasTileAreaPoly with zOffset to allow Ground Items tile overlay to be shown at correct height

beforeCommit.message: Add zOffset to Perspective.getCanvasTilePoly and Perspective.getCanvasTileAreaPoly to allow Ground Items tile overlay to be shown at correct height

afterCommit.message: Overload Perspective.getCanvasTilePoly and Perspective.getCanvasTileAreaPoly with zOffset to allow Ground Items tile overlay to be shown at correct height
